A Change Is Gonna Come, Solomon Burke (Design, Producer)
BULLET::::- "A Change is Gonna Come" - Wayne Brady
"A Change Is Gonna Come" is a song by Sam Cooke.
A Change Is Gonna Come is the debut album of American soul singer–songwriter Leela James issued in June 2005 on Warner Bros. Records.
BULLET::::- 2013 – "A Change Is Gonna Come" "(written by Sam Cooke)"
